definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: He was rather cut up after his wife passed away.
sentences.chinese: 太太身故后，他感到切肤之痛。

sentences.english: Residual double-wide protection of the deceased to highlight the dignity of life, reflecting family responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 身故全残双倍保障，彰显人生尊严，体现家庭责任。

sentences.english: Estate planning. Who will manage the kids' inheritance should you die unexpectedly?
sentences.chinese: 万一你不幸身故谁会来掌管孩子们的遗产？

sentences.english: She was diagnosed with an advanced stage of leukaemia and died.
sentences.chinese: 她被确诊为白血病晚期并已身故。

sentences.english: Some little rockets for his mouth and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一些小的身故体验深谷他的嘴巴和眼睛。

definition: to fall due/to come to the end of a term/to expire
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
to settle a claim/claims settlement/payment of claims
life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
